challenges.description: A simple web application vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks. Learn to identify and exploit reflected XSS vulnerabilities.

metadata.author: Security Practice Platform
hints: Look for user input that is reflected back in the page without proper sanitization
Try entering JavaScript code in the search form
The flag is revealed when XSS successfully executes
learning_objectives: Identify XSS vulnerabilities in web forms
Understand the impact of reflected XSS

challenges.name: Basic XSS Challenge

challenges.description: Exploit a path traversal vulnerability to access files outside the intended directory. Learn about directory traversal attacks and how to identify insecure file handling.

metadata.author: Security Practice Platform
hints: The application allows viewing files, but doesn't properly validate paths
Try using '../' sequences to navigate up directories
The flag is stored in a file at /app/flag.txt
learning_objectives: Practice exploiting insecure file access controls

challenges.name: Path Traversal Challenge
